pr_title: added testcontainers integration test to verify jaeger example app works in Java 7

timeline.message: added testcontainers test that runs jaeger example app in jre7 docker image and verifies trace is received in jaeger

timeline.bodyText:
Consider using withCopyFileToContainer and withCmd on GenericContainer instead.
There is no ned to build an image here and it will only add an overhead to the startup :)
timeline.author: bsideup

timeline.bodyText:
any reason you did not annotate jaegerExampleAppContainer with @Rule or @ClassRule?
The container will get removed, eventually (thanks to Testcontainers' two phase cleanup: JVM shutdown hook and Ryuk - a sidecar container), but here you only start it from this test and then never call stop, so it will last until JVM's termination
timeline.author: bsideup

replies.bodyText:
Ah I was going to change that :)
As its only doing one test, I've changed it to a @Rule so that its started before the test, the Jaeger container is still started as a @ClassRule so to guarantee starting in the correct order.
replies.author: jarebudev

replies.bodyText:
to guarantee starting in the correct order

In case you need to enforce the order, there is also GenericContainer#dependsOn for that :)
replies.author: bsideup
